Pre-Game Insights: Colombia have maintained a 23-match unbeaten run heading into this Copa America clash.
Paraguay have failed to score in four of their last five matches.
Colombia’s Luis Diaz is just one goal away from reaching 50 caps and has netted 12 goals for the national team.
Colombia’s last defeat was at the hands of Argentina in February 2022.
Colombia have outscored opponents 12-3 in their recent fixtures.
Colombia have never trailed in their last four games this year and have won each time they scored first.
Paraguay recently snapped a four-match winless streak with a 1-0 win over Panama.
Paraguay have failed to score in their previous four encounters before this victory.
Paraguay’s last victory in the Copa America against Colombia dates back to 2007.
Colombia’s Nestor Lorenzo has managed to instil a winning mentality and consistency in his team.
Daniel Garnero’s defensive tactics have been effective, but his inability to enhance the team’s attacking prowess has been a significant drawback.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled for June 24, 2024, at 11pm UK at NRG Stadium, Houston.
Colombia’s approach will revolve around maintaining possession and applying constant pressure on Paraguay’s defence.
Paraguay will adopt a more conservative approach, focusing on deep defending and swift counter-attacks.
The midfield battle between James Rodriguez and Mathias Villasanti is a key duel to watch.
The wing battles involving Luis Diaz and Paraguay’s right-back are also critical.
Colombia’s expected lineup includes Ospina, S. Arias, Mina, Cuesta, Machado, Uribe, Lerma, J. Arias, Rodriguez, Diaz, and Cordoba.
Paraguay’s expected lineup includes Coronel, Velazquez, Balbuena, Gomez, Alonso, Villasanti, Cubas, Almiron, Sosa, Bareiro, and Enciso.
Others: Nestor Lorenzo’s side will aim to dominate possession, create chances through intricate play in the final third, and maintain defensive solidity.
Daniel Garnero’s team will focus on a disciplined defensive structure and quick counters.
Both teams have a history of committing fouls and receiving bookings, suggesting a high likelihood of cards.
The stakes of the tournament opener, combined with the physical style of play both teams are known for, indicate a combative encounter.
Betting on total cards over 4.5 appears to be a well-supported prediction.
